block.p: GREINER-Andreas ''Andy.'' Of Pomfret, VT, born January 31, 1969, in Munich, Germany, husband of Nicole Fosse Greiner, father of three children, was killed by a drunk driver in Salt Lake City, Utah, on August 10, 2000. Service arrangements are pending with a notice to appear at a later date. In lieu of flowers, friends may make donations in Andy's memory to Mothers Against Drunk Driving.
